name: Let There Be Blocks
description:
God wants to create the world, but Satan is trying to stop Him!
Grab a friend and get ready to bless and blaspheme with this all-new divine dramedy, a challenging asymmetrical PVP experience! Play as God, dropping new matter from Heaven to Earth, Tetris-style; or play the devil's advocate and try to burn the world with your hellfire, Space-Invaders style!

Credits:

Eran Eisenberg - Programming, Soundtrack, SFX and more

Mor Hen - Programming, Integrating, QA and more

Lila Egozy - Design, Background, UI and more

Yuval Beck - Design, Characters and more
